title: PRE_APPROVED Documents Cannot Revert to DRAFT for Re-Review

comment:
Review complete. Document verified as COMPLIANT with SOP-003 requirements.

FRONTMATTER VERIFICATION:
- title: "Executable Document Checkout Workflow Gaps" - present and descriptive
- revision_summary: "Simplified scope; finalized versioning model" - acceptable for v0.x executable document

STRUCTURE VERIFICATION (per SOP-003 Section 5):
- Section 1 Purpose: Present - clearly states why INV exists
- Section 2 Scope: Complete with Context, Deviation Type (Procedural), Systems Affected
- Section 3 Background: Complete with Expected/Current behavior tables and timeline
- Section 4 Description: Detailed facts for both deviations with evidence
- Section 5 Impact Assessment: Complete with systems, documents, and other impacts
- Section 6 Root Cause Analysis: Identifies fundamental cause and contributing factors
- Section 7 Remediation Plan: CAPA table with proposed requirements REQ-WF-016, REQ-WF-017
- Sections 8-10: Execution sections present with appropriate placeholders

INV WARRANTED (per SOP-003 Section 4.1): Yes - root cause required analysis, issue is systemic, formal CAPA appropriate.

CAPA APPROPRIATENESS: CAPA-001 correctly typed as Corrective; proposes implementation via child CR with specific requirements addressing both gaps.

No placeholder content in pre-approved sections (1-6). No typos or formatting errors found.
